title: Soldier (Shayzien)

Soldiers are members of the Shayzien Army found in the Shayzien Encampment. They have identical stats and drops to regular guards, but cannot be pickpocketed

They appear to be wearing a black scimitar and a black kiteshield. They have a tougher version, their sergeant.
